import React from 'react'; import '../Styles/App.css'; import {Header, Divider, Grid, Icon, Image, Table} from 'semantic-ui-react' class About extends React.Component { render() { return( <>
About me
Life

Currently, I am a fourth-year student at the Wrocław University of Technology. This is my last semester in the field of Computer Science with a specialization in Computer Systems and Networks.


Since 2015 I am also a fitness, indoor cycling and trampoline instructor. It is my great passion as well as a chance to meet new people and express myself.

Education
NAME OF THE UNIVERSITY FIELD PERIOD Wroclaw University of Science and Technology Computer Science 2017 - now Secondary school no. 1 in Bełchatów Math-physic 2014 - 2017
Experience
NAME OF THE COMPANY POSITION DESCRIPTION PERIOD PGS Software Wrocław Front-end Developer Preparation of an online store application. Work related to the course at the university - performed in a group. 03.2020-06.2020 Fitness Academy Wrocław Fitness Instructor & Customer Service Conducting fitness classes, work in the customer service department, marketing activities.Replacing the manager in his absence. 09.2017-now Green Power Station Bełchatów Fitness Instructor & Customer Service Organization of marathons / events, management of the club's profile, preparation of advertising materials, conducting fitness classes. 06.2016- 07.2017 Fitness Club Olimpia Bełchatów Fitness Instructor Organization of fitness shows, conducting fitness and cycling classes. Managing the club's fanpage on Facebook. 01.2015- 06.2016


) } } export default About
